remarks: Split a decimal number into two parts.  Inductive step.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jul-2015.)
statement:
decsplit0.1 $e |- A e. NN0 $.
decsplit.2 $e |- B e. NN0 $.
decsplit.3 $e |- D e. NN0 $.
decsplit.4 $e |- M e. NN0 $.
decsplit.5 $e |- ( M + 1 ) = N $.
decsplit.6 $e |- ( ( A x. ( 10 ^ M ) ) + B ) = C $.
decsplit $p |- ( ( A x. ( 10 ^ N ) ) + ; B D ) = ; C D $.
